title: Analysis of accum. func. with graph of integrand part - b

content.description:
Let f be the function given by f(x) = (ln x)(sin x). The figure below shows the graph of f for 0 < x ≤ 2π.

The function g is defined by \(\displaystyle g(x)=\int_1^xf(t)dt\) for 0 < x ≤ 2π.
content.question: On what intervals, if any, is g increasing? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: On what intervals, if any, is g increasing? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
